message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
I understand that $95 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm still not quite there yet.  I can offer $100 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable going any lower. I can offer it to you for $108.
